channel.title: Memory Card MicroSD problems
channel.description:
I bought one of these a few months ago for my phone. It's an 8gb MicroSDHD card, and was working fine up until today. I opened my phone on the PC and it said the "memory card information was not found" or something along those lines. So I try to open up a file from the memory card through my phone, but "file does not exist". I take out the card and insert it again and get a message on my phone saying "format unrecognizable - would you like to format the card now?". I go Yes but it just returns "ERROR!", and that's it.
I plug it in to my computer through the phone and the memory card isn't even there.
Any ideas? My phone is a samsung tocco. I will try it on my sisters phone when she is back and see what happens...

item.title: Memory Card MicroSD problems
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

Well, still not working a few hours later. I might just buy another one…They’re only £10…

Read full topic

item.title: Memory Card MicroSD problems
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

That, or your phone specifically accepts microSD. Anything 4GB+ goes into SDHC territory. Some things don’t like that unless it specifically says so.

Read full topic

item.title: Memory Card MicroSD problems
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

Mr.Chris:

samsung

Thats your Problem!

I have a samsung and sometimes randomly my 1GB MicroSD card will say that it cannot find the ./root directory. I just took out the Card from the phone and waited about 10 minutes put it back in and it miraculously works!

Read full topic
